subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam struggled with her putting but shot a one-under-par 70, taking a one-shot lead over Paula Creamer at the Stanford International Pro-Am in Aventura, Fla. Sorenstam, seeking her 71st L.P.G.A. Tour victory, has won five consecutive events when she has taken a one-shot lead into the final round.
